name: cookingTemperature_increase
description: This function is used to increase the temperature of the cooker.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to increase the temperature.

parameters.name: predefinedCompartment
parameters.description: The specific compartment within the device to increase the temperature.

parameters.name: cookingTemperatureDelta
parameters.description: The amount by which to increase the cooking temperature.
